Key.English: Order your men to follow me
$%1 Received for the neutralization assistance of a %2.
Key.Russian: $%1 Получено за оказание помощи в нейтрализации %2.

Key.English: You were deducted from $%1 due to your gear
Key.Russian: У вас изъято $%1 за ваше снаряжение

Key.English: WARNNING! An Intercontinental ballistic missile launch has been detected!
You are the new Commander! Good luck!
A "%1" structure is going to be sold in %2 seconds!
Key.Russian: "%1" постройка будет продана в течении %2 секунд!

Key.English: Your Squad has been awarded with %1%2 for the completion of a secondary objective.
Key.Russian: Ваш отряд был награжден %1%2 за завершения вторичной цели.

Key.English: Player %1 (ID: %2) freaks out and rioted in Base (%3 has been destroyed)!
Key.Russian: Игрок %1 (ID: %2) ведет себя вызывающе на базе (%3 был уничтожен)!

Key.English: $%1 removed for a teamkill! go to the ophthalmologist...
Your commander has ordered you to perform a "%1" order for %2!
You will be sent back to the lobby for teamswapping. Please join your original team!
Key.Russian: Вы будете возвращены в лобби за смену команды. Пожалуйста вернитесь в вашу команду!

Key.English: %1 Upgrade completed, %1 is now at Level %2.
Send the order to the squad

Capacity:

Weapons: %1/%2 (Size: %3)
Magazines: %4/%5
Overall: %6/%7
Key.Russian:
Вместимость:

Оружия: %1/%2 (Size: %3)
Магазины: %4/%5
Всего: %6/%7

Key.English:
Capacity:

Weapons: %1/%2
Magazines: %3/%4
Backpacks: %5/%6
Key.Russian:
Вместимость:

Оружия: %1/%2
Магазины: %3/%4
Рюкзаки: %5/%6

Key.English: The unit cannot carry a backpack.

Information:

The template upgrade level is above the current gear or barrack upgrade level.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Уровень модернизации предметов в шаблоне выше, чем уровень модернизации снаряжения или казарм.

Key.English:
Information:

The template cannot be set due to some foreign equipment.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Шаблон не может быть создан из-за иностранного снаряжения.

Key.English: A template may only be removed from the template tab in the gear view.
Key.Russian: Для удаления шаблона сначала нужно выбрать его на вкладке шаблонов.

Key.English: <t size='1.1'><t color='#42b6ff' shadow='1'>Gear Cost: </t><t shadow='1' color='%1'>$%2.</t></t>
Information:\n\n You may not use the quick reload function since you don't have any custom gear, you need to purchase a loadout first.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Вы не можете использовать функцию быстрой перезарядки, так как у вас нет индивидуального снаряжения, вам нужно сначала приобрести снаряжение.

Key.English: Information:\n\n You've reached the bases area limit, you can sell old buildings or build in an existing base area.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Количество районов для баз достигло предела, вы можете продать старые здания, или построить в районе существующей базы.

Key.English:
Information:

Infantry may not be purchased while camps in the city are held by the enemy.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Пехота не может быть куплена, пока бункеры города удерживаются противником.

Key.English: Information:\n\n Manned Vehicles cannot be hooked. Make sure that the vehicle is empty.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Техника с юнитами не может перевозиться. Убедись что техника пуста.

Key.English: Information:\n\n You've failed to unlock the vehicle.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Вам не удалось открыть транспорт отмычкой.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The vehicle has been successfully unlocked.
Information:\n\n You need at last one artillery in order to call a Fire Mission.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Для вызова артиллерии у Вас должна быть хотя бы одна арт. установка.

Key.English: Information:\n\n An aerial unit has been called according to your order, it shall arrive here quite soon.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n По вашему приказу вызван десантный ЛА, он скоро прибудет на место.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The MHQ is already being repaired.
Information:\n\n %1 %2 Needed in order to repair the MHQ.
Information:\n\n There is no MHQ to repair around.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Поблизости нет КШМ который можно было отремонтировать.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The MHQ is being fixed...
Information:\n\n A Supply truck of your team has delivered supplies at %1, the supply value is now %2/%3. $%4. Gained during the delivery.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Грузовик снабжения доставил 1% единиц припасов. Объем припасов %2/%3. $%4 Получено во время доставки.

Key.English: Information:\n\n A Supply truck of your team has delivered supplies at %1, the supply value is %2/%3.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Грузовик снабжения доставил %1 единиц припасов, Объем припасов %2/%3.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The Supply truck is fully loaded.
Information:\n\n The Supply truck has %1 supplies in cargo.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n В грузовик снабжения загружено %1 единиц поставки.

Key.English: Information:\n\n Spotting Ability require the use of binoculars.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Чтобы указать цель используйте бинокль.

Key.English:
Information:

You are currently missing $%1 in order to buy: %2.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Не хватает $%1 для покупки: %2.

Key.English:
Information:

Purchased Equipement to %1 for $%2.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Куплено снаряжение для %1 за $%2.

Key.English:
Information:

The gear was not purchased since nothing has changed.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Снаряжение не куплено т.к. оно не изменилось.

Key.English:
Information:

You may not transfer money to yourself.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Вы не можете переводить деньги себе.

Key.English:
Information:

$%1. were sent to %2.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

$%1. были отправлены %2.

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 is being healed.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the healing...
Key.Russian:
Информация:

A %1 лечится.

Пожалуйста подождите %2 секунд для лечения...

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has failed to be healed.

Information:

A %1 has been successfully healed.

Key.Russian:
Информация:

Достигнут лимит отряда (%1 человек).

Key.English:
Warning!

You are leaving the battlefield!

%1 Seconds left.
Key.Russian:
Внимание!

Вы покинули поле битвы!Осталось

%1 секунд до наказания.

Key.English:
Information:

The maximal queue has been reached for this factory (%1), please be patient.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

очередь завода достигла максимума (%1), пожалуйста подождите.

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 is being rearmed.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the rearm process...
Key.Russian:
Информация:

%1 перевооружается.

Ждите %2 секунд для перезарядки...

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has failed to be rearmed.

Information:

A %1 is being refueled.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the refuel process...
Key.Russian:
Информация:

%1 заправляется.

Пожалуйста ждите %2 секунд для заправки...

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has failed to be refueled.

Information:

A %1 is being repaired.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the reparations...
Key.Russian:
Информация:

%1 ремонтируется.

Ждите %2 секунд для починки...

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has failed to be repaired.

Information:

A %1 has been successfully repaired.

Information:

Your squad has captured a camp near %1 and has been rewarded with $%2.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Ваш отряд захватил бункер недалеко от %1 и получил вознаграждение в размере $%2.
Время работы: %1 день, %2 часов, %3 минут, %4 секунд

Key.English:
One of our scout team has reported us that multiple resistance squads are heading toward our base.

According to the report, theirs arrival is imminent, we will have to defend the base at all cost, HQ has ordered us to neutralize the threat even if the base is lost.
Key.Russian:
Одна из наших разведкоманд сообщает о многочисленных отрядах сопротивления приближающихся к нашей базе.

Из их доклада следует что нападение неизбежно, мы должны защитить базу любой ценой, штаб приказал нейтрализовать угрозу даже если база уничтожена.

Key.English:
HQ warned us about an incomming mercenary helicopter hunting down our Squadleaders.

Your mission is to locate and destroy that helicopter.
Key.Russian:
Штаб уведомил нас о приближающемся вертолете наемников,охотящимся на командиров отделений.

Ваша задача - обнаружить и уничтожить вертолет.

Key.English:
Our intels has informed us that a resistance commander is planning an attack on %1.

The attack will be launched soon, make sure to defend that town at all cost.

A Search and Destroy mission will be necessary to complete %1 defense.
Key.Russian:
Наша разведка сообщила нам, что командующий силами сопротивления планирует нападение на %1.

Наступление начнется скоро, будте уверены, этот город должен быть защищен любой ценой.

Необходимо найти и уничтожить силы сопротивления %1 defense.

Key.English:
From what we've learned from our intels, an UAV has been shot down in this area, retrieving it's module is essential for our team as it contains critical intel about enemy forces.

Once that your team has secured the crash site, we will send a team to retrieve the module, make sure to protect them.
Key.Russian:
По данным нашей разведки БЛА был сбит в этом районе, нужно вернуть модуль БЛА так как он важен для нашей команды, поскольку содержит критически важные сведения о вражеских силах,

Как только Ваша команда обнаружит место крушения, мы пошлем команду, чтобы извлечь модуль, позаботьтесь об их защите.

Key.English: GAMEPLAY: Track AI on Map (yellow dots)
An Artillery Minimap display fitler has been toggled
Key.Russian: Режим фильтра на артиллерийском дисплее был сменен

Key.English: Click on the map to activate the selected action
Key.Russian: Нажмите на карту, чтобы активировать выбранное действие

Key.English: This icon allows you to toggle between the different artillery display mode on the map
Key.Russian: Эта кнопка позволит вам переключать различные режимы отображения артиллерии на карте

Key.English: Allows the commander to handle Squads, Squadmember and Special Tasks
Key.Russian: Позволяет командиру руководить отрядами, членами команды и специальными задачами

Key.English: Allows the commander to handle the income distribution and HQ-workers
Key.Russian: Позволяет командиру руководить распределением доходов и работниками HQ

Key.English: Artillery, Ammo/Vehicle-drop, Paratroop, UnitCam, FastTravel, UAV and ICBM
Key.Russian: Артиллерия, Боеприпасы/Сброс-Техники, Парашютисты, Камера Юнита, Быстрое перемещение, UAV и ICBM

Key.English: Allows the commander to handle the factory enhancements
Weapon, Ammonition, Backpacks, Bags and Misc
Key.Russian: Оружие, Аммуниция, Рюкзаки, Сумки и прочее

Key.English: Distance View/Details, Money Transfer and KI-Member
Key.Russian: Дистанция Обзора/Детализация, Перевод средств и ИИ-члены

Key.English: Toggle between the default and current gear
Key.Russian: Переключение между страндартным и текущем снаряжением

Key.English: Respawn stucked Supply Trucks. ATTENTION => ALL Trucks will be destroyed!
Key.Russian: Появление грузовика снабжение невозможно. ВНИМАНИЕ => Все грузовики будут уничтожены!

Key.English: Purchase light Vehicles (Hmmwv, Truck, Motorcycle, Bike, Boat ect.)
Buy Units on a conquered Depot
This upgrade requires a parameter to be enabled
Key.Russian: Эта модернизация должна быть разрешена в настройках миссии

Key.English: This upgrade requires the %1 upgrade at level %2

This upgrade unlocks infantry units.

This allows the team to buy better infantry units at the Barracks.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks infantry units.

This allows the team to buy better infantry units at the Barracks.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks Fast Travel.

Allows the use of Fast Traveling from the Tactical Center.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks Fast Travel.

Allows the use of Fast Traveling from the Tactical Center.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks weapons and gear.

This allows the team to buy better weapons and gear at the Barracks.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks weapons and gear.

This allows the team to buy better weapons and gear at the Barracks.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks ammo and ordinance.

This allows the commander to place ammo and ordinance crates from the construction menu.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks ammo and ordinance.

This allows the commander to place ammo and ordinance crates from the construction menu.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks light vehicles.

This allows the team to buy better vehicles at the Light Factory.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks light vehicles.

This allows the team to buy better vehicles at the Light Factory.

Key.English:
Multiplier to increase supply income.

Multi of Supply per Min (Level 0-2): x1 / x2 / x3. Supplies per Truck Load (Level 0-2): 5 / 7 / 10
Key.Russian:
Multiplier to increase supply income.

Multi of Supply per Min (Level 0-2): x1 / x2 / x3. Supplies per Truck Load (Level 0-2): 5 / 7 / 10

Key.English:
Increases the mobile spawn respawn distance.

Maximum distance (Level 0-2): 250m / 350m / 500m
Key.Russian:
Increases the mobile spawn respawn distance.

Maximum distance (Level 0-2): 250m / 350m / 500m

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks heavy vehicles.

This allows the team to buy better vehicles at the Heavy Factory.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks heavy vehicles.

This allows the team to buy better vehicles at the Heavy Factory.

Key.English:
This upgrade decreases the cooldown time of Artillery.

Cooldown (Level 0-3): 300s / 250s / 200s / 150s
Key.Russian:
This upgrade decreases the cooldown time of Artillery.

Cooldown (Level 0-3): 300s / 250s / 200s / 150s

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks new ammunition for Artillery pieces.

This allows the Artillery-units to fire improved ammunition.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks new ammunition for Artillery pieces.

This allows the Artillery-units to fire improved ammunition.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks aircrafts.

This allows the team to buy better aircraft at the Aircraft Factory and Airport Hangars.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks aircrafts.

This allows the team to buy better aircraft at the Aircraft Factory and Airport Hangars.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks airlifting.

This upgrade is a requirement for teams that want to use Airlifting.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks airlifting.

This upgrade is a requirement for teams that want to use Airlifting.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks supply paradrop.

This allows the team to call a vehicle or ammo paradrop from the Tactical Center.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks supply paradrop.

This allows the team to call a vehicle or ammo paradrop from the Tactical Center.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks paratroop.

This allows the team to call paratroop drops from the Tactical Center.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks paratroop.

This allows the team to call paratroop drops from the Tactical Center.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks UAV.

This allows the team to buy a UAV from the Tactical Center.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks UAV.

This allows the team to buy a UAV from the Tactical Center.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks ICBM.

This allows the team to buy an ICBM from the Tactical Center.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks ICBM.

This allows the team to buy an ICBM from the Tactical Center.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The camp is already repaired.
Information:\n\n The camp is being repaired.
Information:\n\n There is no nearby camps which can be repaired.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Нет близлежащих бункеров, которые можно отремонтировать.

Key.English: Information:\n\n You are currently missing $%1. in order to repair a camp.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n В настоящее время отсутствует $%1. для ремонта бункера.

Key.English: Information:\n\n None of the nearby camps are destroyed.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Ни один из близлежащих бункеров не разрушен.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The repair truck is either too far or destroyed.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Спец. техника либо далеко либо уничтожена.

Key.English: Capturing %1 is essential to our team, neutralizing %1 Depot will ensure it's capture.
Key.Russian: Захват %1 имеет большое значение для нас. Захватите бункер в центре для захвата города.

Key.English: <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> has been captured by our team, Defending <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> Depot and Camps might be necessary to prevent enemies from taking it.
Key.Russian: <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> был захвачен вашей командой, Защищайте склад и бункеры <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> для удержания стратегической точки.
